title: Does The U.S. Soccer Team Have A Bright Future?
teaser: With the World Cup over for the U.S., Mike Pesca says "there are a lot of things in the way of United States going to the next level."
contentencoded:
The U.S. is out of the World Cup, which resumes tomorrow with quarterfinal matches. Does the team have a bright future ahead? Our sports analyst Mike Pesca says “there are a lot of things in the way of United States going to the next level.” He joins Here & Now’s Robin Young to explain.

Guest

  • Mike Pesca, Here & Now sports analyst and host of Slate’s The Gist podcast. He tweets @pescami.
